recommendations.title: Fix Critical Accessibility Issues
recommendations.description: 160 critical issues found that prevent users from accessing content.
recommendations.action: Address all critical issues immediately before deployment.

recommendations.title: Fix Serious Accessibility Issues
recommendations.description: 67 serious issues found that significantly impact user experience.
recommendations.action: Address serious issues in the next sprint.

recommendations.title: Apply Accessible Button Pattern
recommendations.description: Use the AccessibleButton.tsx component as a template for all interactive elements.
recommendations.action: Refactor existing buttons to use the accessible pattern.

recommendations.title: Add ARIA Labels
recommendations.description: All interactive elements need descriptive labels for screen readers.
recommendations.action: Add aria-label or aria-labelledby to all buttons, links, and inputs.

recommendations.title: Keyboard Navigation
recommendations.description: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible.
recommendations.action: Add proper keyboard event handlers (onKeyDown) and tabIndex to clickable elements.
